attributes.action: allow people of all faiths to teach in Scottish Catholic schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 1980 Education (Scotland) Act states that the Catholic Church must approve staff in schools. Tax payers pay for these schools, pupils of all faiths go the schools. Teachers must not be discriminated because of their own personal religious beliefs.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
